name: Sword [2]
description: A sword with a thick blade is widely used.

name: Swordbreaker [2]
description: Knives made for destroying enemy's weapons, but the success rate is not high.

name: Swordbreaker [3]
description: Knives made for destroying enemy's weapons, but the success rate is not high.

name: T2 Growth Chest
description: Designed for lovable RO fans! It help you upgrade to meet T2 requirements! With everything you like or dislike! Thank you for your love and expectation for RO!

name: T2 Growth Gift Chest
description: Designed for lovable RO fans! With several fine gifts! Have a good time!

name: T2 Growth Pack
description: Designed for lovable RO fans! With several fine gifts! Have a good time!

name: T2 Job Pack
description: A gift pack for R2 Job rewards. It contains Zeny x1000, Potion x5, Transformation Pack x1.

name: T2 Practicing Pack
description: A T2 practice pack given by Adventure Association (can used by T2 players and above). Open the pack to receive JOB EXP Potion (M) x5, BASE EXP Potion (M) x5, Valkyrie's Gift x2, Belief Token x20, Gold Medal x2, Eden Coin x200, Advancing T2 Practicing Pack 1.

name: Talent Fruit
description: The fruit of talent tree in Monster Eden. With magical power, the fruit is said to be popular among all monsters. Pets randomly acquire all skills after using the fruit.

name: Tarot Card Album
description: Use to gain a random card with a chance to gain card dungeon exclusive card!

name: Taurus Crown
description: Crown that symbolizes Taurus, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with emerald.

name: Taurus Crown Blueprint
description: Crown that symbolizes Taurus, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with emerald.

name: Taurus Crown [1]
description: Crown that symbolizes Taurus, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with emerald.

name: Taurus Diadem
description: Diadem that symbolizes Taurus, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with emerald.
